Audio.Locality: RPPN Estação Veracel, Porto Seguro, Bahia
Audio.Author: Juha Honkala
Audio.Comments: Lowland forest in the Veracel reserve. Low quality recording because the noise of insects and the long distance to the bird. The calls are audible in seconds 0:02, 0:37, 0:61, 0:93.bird-seen:noplayback-used:no
